suite.name: Add to Cart and Apply Promo
suite.source: e:\Selenium\Selenium_Python\Robot\Add to Cart and Apply Promo.robot

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: exexcutable_path is being deprecated. Please use service to configure the driver's executable_path as per documentation.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
